item.title: Nathan Poppe named editor at Curbside Chronicle
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
In a major career shift, Nathan Poppe has left The Oklahoman, one of the state’s long-standing legacy newspapers, and joins the small, nonprofit Curbside Chronicle as editor. Curbside vendors can be seen in their green smocks selling the slick, impressive magazine produced to help the vendors work their way out of homelessness. But this is […]

The post Nathan Poppe named editor at Curbside Chronicle appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Curbside Chronicle vendors selling flowers through Valentines Day
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
Mai Nguyen bought four bouquets at the Curbside Chronicle pop-up shop even before the organization had all of its display in place in the Plaza District Friday. “These are really beautiful flowers,” she told Free Press. “I’m going to use them for a gal-entines party I’m hosting with my girlfriends tonight.” But it wasn’t just […]

The post Curbside Chronicle vendors selling flowers through Valentines Day appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Small staff, big impact – Curbside Chronicle fights homelessness
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
Curbside Chronicle is well-known in the core of the metro where about 50 vendors wearing the signature green smocks sell the award-winning magazine at street corners. Only three people produce it and coach some vendors on how to write stories. Impact But the impact of the monthly magazine is big. They help people who are […]

The post Small staff, big impact – Curbside Chronicle fights homelessness appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Curbside Chronicle wins top international awards
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
Oklahoma City’s Curbside Chronicle has won two international awards and was a finalist in three other categories for 2017. International Network of Street Papers, or INSP, announced the awards Thursday at the organization’s yearly summit held this year in Manchester, UK. Out of 11 categories, Curbside Chronicle took the top awards for Best Cultural Feature […]

The post Curbside Chronicle wins top international awards appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.
